'''"The Adventurer's Burdens"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "The Adventurer's Burdens" is purchasable from [[Master Lu]] for {{Item|Mora|24|x=50,000}}.
